Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Fantasie und Fuge über das Motiv B-A-C-H, S. 529ii

1870 · LW A250 · R. 22

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The original version of this work, from around 1856, is for organ (S. 260i; LW E3; R. 381), which Liszt arranged for solo piano (S. 529i; LW A250). In 1870, Liszt revised both the organ version (S. 260ii; LW E3; R. 381) and the piano version (S. 529ii; LW A250; R. 22).

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/5 · Z. A/B 7295 · Großes Konzertsolo; Sonata; B-A-C-H · ed. Antal Boronkay

Duration: 11'

Difficulty: 4.5
